name: Insect Run
description:
Only playable on pc/mac/linux

This is my first 3d game, and also the first project i've finished with Unity. It took me a lot of time and effort before this was done. Please share this with a friend if you enjoyed what i made :).

(There might be 1 update if people want one, with extra items/insects/missions)
Music is made by me (i used some bongo-loops though)

Help the insects! ;) ;))
